ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 94
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh. So I have to time when the ancient croc is gonna spawn and get up at 3am to kill him and hope he has the leggings and not the sleves again every night
ygData.messageBody:
Heh.
So I have to time when the ancient croc is gonna spawn and get up at 3am to kill him and hope he
has the leggings and not the sleves again every night (and hope I don't get up for nothing if
someone else timed it and gotten there before me, or a wiz just killsteals it from me)? Why do I
have to sit for 20 hours to get jboots with my lvl 35 char and get no experience at all? I pay to
play this game. I find most of it amusing and fun. I don't find the camping and the killstealing
that follows it hand in hand very amusing. Why can't I complain about an unwanted feature in a
product I pay for?

/A

> this arguement though is just going to fall on deaf ears.. I for one can
> time a lot of spawns great... late at night I can come on for say 2 hours
> and totally rotate every npc spawn in for ex. upper guk (scyer, ancient
> croc, warden, squire, giant spider) <not the lord.. yet at least>... and I
> usually come away with at least one good item... now maybe I dont "NEED"
> this item but I do get some mighty nice items which are then used to trade
> for other stuff that I do need.
>
> So this dumb arguement about 20 hours being required for every single nice
> item is not a valid one. Yes for ruby you usually do have to camp for hours
> unless your lucky but I have known a few people to get their lucky breaks
> (for ex. a friend of mine was camping the avatar of fear.. wasnt there for
> more then 15min, the avatar spawned.. and he was carrying a Ruby BP).
>
> Also, I think the point the guy was trying to make is "have fun" if your not
> having fun then you shouldnt be playing? er better yet why are you playing
> if your not overall having fun?
>
> A sign of power in my book would be one that gets by without having to whine
> 24/7...
> =D
>
> ok lets get back on topic.. anyone know the ratio of times the Lord in upper
> guk will be carrying the ghoulsbane as compared to the silvered bracer? heh
>
